title: Former Steeler Robin Cole Visits Monongahela Valley Hospital (Monongahela Valley Hospital)
text: ( Source : Monongahela Valley Hospital ) ( October 16 , 2015 - Carroll Township , Pa.) The 160 members of Monongahela Valley ( MVH ) Hospital's leadership team were pleasantly surprised when former Pittsburgh Steeler Robin Cole was the guest
